description: This album essentially created music.There has never, and will never be an album as good as this album. Mozart, Bach, Beethoven, the Beatles, none can make anything close to as good as this masterpiece

title: The Suns Tirade
description: By Isaiah's definition, a sun's tirade means a long and hot day with the sun beating down on you. You're tired and contemplating about what you did the whole time, with Rashad's case, it's an allegory for thetroubles he faced at that point.

title: Yeezus
description: Yeezus is a concept album; a narrative album; a singular story with a beginning, middle, and end following the journey of an anti-hero from supreme arrogance to vulnerable weakness to becoming a cautious romantic.
